about_the_game:
Cynabre is a tactical shooter game played in teams, pitting two factions with divergent technologies against each other.

Defeat your enemies using different strategic classes in a universe mixing SteamPunk and science fiction.
Cooperate and trap your opponents to capture the Cynabre.

Discover a unique game mode! Capture the Cynabre in the depths of a mine and bring it back to your ship through a unique level design based on ambush and traps. Evolve in this unique map, wait and trap your opponents to regain possession of the crystal and steal it from them. Navigate winding mining galleries, capture buff zones, and gain advantage over the enemy with your unique abilities.

Play as one of the game's three classes, different depending on your faction:
Commander: Pillar of your team, you are the only one who can transport the Cynabre, communicate and provide support to your allies so that they protect you and escort you to your base.
Controller: You are the tank of your team, lead the pace of combat, take hits and protect your teammates at all costs. The centerpiece of team combat, you are the key to the survival of your allies.
Tracker: Take down your opponents and don't let them breathe, you are the damage of the team, equipped to take in pincers and do maximum damage. Bring down the Cynabre, create a breach in the fight and dominate the game with your ability to kill.

name: Cynabre

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: intel core i5-5200
  • Memory: 1200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Defeat your enemies using different strategic classes in a universe mixing SteamPunk and science fiction. Cooperate and trap your opponents to capture the Cynabre.
